name: Demo Quest
description:
Keyboard arrows: Control the character

Space bar: Interact 

Tip: Don't wander too much in the desert region, if you go into battle, it's best to escape, otherwise it's suicide

This game I made as a prototype of a future larger project of RPG Maker 2003, I made this just watching tutorials

List of Missions:

1. Morris Mission

2. Morris Insulted

3. Rock Broken

4. Ninja School

5. Ninja Master Dead

6. Larry Dead

7. Gave Larry Money
